g.text: Four kinds of Ca-bentonite ores from Wei Fang, Lai Xi, and Inner Mongolia (two types) in
China were puriﬁed according to the principle of Stokes settlement in water. The four puriﬁed
montmorillonites were denoted as M1, M2, M3, and M4, respectively. The particle size of puriﬁed
raction (XRD) spectrums of the four kinds of puriﬁed montmorillonite are
, which shows that the four puriﬁed montmorillonites only contain few quartz
impurities and can meet the requirements of crystal structure calculation. In addition, the chemical
compositions of the four kinds of montmorillonite were analyzed by XRF. According to the
), the position of various ions in the lattice of
montmorillonite and the corresponding crystal formulas were determined [
. The crystal chemical formulas of the four kinds of montmorillonite were
, respectively. Therefore, the semi-unit layer charge density of the four kinds of
